messages.title: Your experienced local champion
messages.content: On 7th May, you will have the chance to choose the best person to represent you at Westminster. You can choose between more of the same with the UK parties, or vote for the SNP's Pete Wishart to stand up for Scotland.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Oppose crippling austerity that is hitting the most vulnerable, including scrapping Westminster's Bedroom Tax
Campaign against new nuclear weapons, saving Â£100 billion
Protect Scotland's NHS from the privatisation agenda in England and Wales

issues.health: Protect Scotland's NHS from the privatisation agenda in England and Wales
